name: Kisho
description:
An classic old game. Put the numbered pieces at the right order, to win.

Hey guys!

We're at the last step of the Game Development Graduation, and this is our final Mobile Games test. Play and rate Kisho will be a really nice way to help us to get better and better.

We still working on it, so it still have some bugs.

Some of the know bugs:

  • When you reach the goal, it don't move to the "Win screen", and don't save the new record.
  • Some devices may stuck at the loadscreen.
  • We haven't added english language yet, sorry :/

We hope you enjoy!

See ya!
